title: No Music in Howling Abyss OR Summoner's Rift
body:
I've had this issue for like two weeks straight now. Multiple fresh installs, clearing registry, CC Cleaner. Tried without headphones and without, with speakers, etc. Tried going through the common audio fixes guide, updated drivers, etc. I have no idea what caused this issue but it seemed to start with 6.8. 

It's driving me up the wall. I can listen to other music when I'm playing, but now its just a matter of pride, dammit.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
To be honest, I have not heard of this particular issue in a very long time.  I don't believe there is anything we can do here on Boards as we are going to have to start pouring over some logs to try to narrow down where the root cause is.  The best step to take is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our Tech Specialists can take a look.  Make sure to provide them the following info as well:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
TY so much for the response, this has been driving me crazy.
